alert.note: Alert for Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:17AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Weakley and northwestern Henry Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 817 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Latham, or 9 miles east of Fulton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottage Grove, Latham, Palmersville, Matheny Grove, Ore Springs, Mill Creek, Brundige, Pisgah, Dukedom, Jones Mill, Ruthville and Crossland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for west Tennessee.
